The '''Engagement Tablet''' was a tablet in [[Bag End]] used by [[Bilbo Baggins]] to mark down the dates of future engagements. He did not remember the dates of his engagements well unless they were on the Tablet. When Bilbo promised to meet with the [[Wizards|Wizard]] [[Gandalf|Gandalf the Grey]], he was too flustered to remember to inscribe it on the tablet and nearly forgot.<ref>{{H|1}}</ref>
